HTTPHeadersIf-Unmodified-Since.summary:
The HyperText Transfer Protocol (HTTP) If-Unmodified-Since request header makes the
request for the resource conditional: the server will send the requested resource or accept it in
the case of a {{HTTPMethod("POST")}} or another non-Safe/HTTP method only if the resource has not been modified after the date specified by this HTTP header. If the resource has been modified
after the specified date, the response will be a {{HTTPStatus("412", "412 Precondition Failed")}} error.

remarks.para: The If-Unmodified-Since HTTP header is commonly used in the following situations:
